string-array.name: wildfire_parent_0
string-array.item: WildFire is the fastest way to get your potential customers to notice your brand, product or services. It is an inorganic JioOnline provided to the organic website, in form of targeted digital advertising that ensures customer calls and website visits.

string-array.name: wildfire_parent_1
string-array.item: If you already have a JioOnline plan (organic SEO), you can simply activate WildFire for your category (prices vary because of difference in supply & demand for keywords by category).

A mix of advertising tools, such as Google AdWords, Facebook Ads, etc. are used to automatically create the most optimised ads & targeting for your website. Which ensure people searching for what’s being advertised end up calling your business number or on your website first.
Note: A minimum of three messages are required on your website for the WildFire plan to start.

string-array.name: delivery_points
string-array.item: If you have an existing website with an integrated payment gateway you can choose to integrate that with your product catalog. To accept payments via your JioOnline website, please add the relevant links to each one of your products via the Buy Online option in your JioOnline product catalog.
If you are listed on an e-commerce marketplace like Amazon, Paytm, Flipkart etc, you can use the URL of the relevant product on the JioOnline Product catalogue.

resources.string: JioOnline currently supports Instamojo as ONLY OPTION as a custom payment gateway. If you want to activate it, get this add-on from our marketplace, and then for it’s activation, we’ll ask you to either create Instamojo account yourself or else we will help you do KYC and help you setup this account.\n\n
Please note that JioOnline just acts as a fecilitator helping businesses like you to get most out of your Business website.\n\n
JioOnline in no way is associated with Instamojo or claim any kind of responsibility related to the custom payment gateway.\n\n

This payment gateway is powered by Instamojo, which allows you to collect your customers’ payment directly into your bank account without any delay, (unlike the default payment gateway provided by JioOnline). With this add-on activated on your JioOnline website your customers see that they are paying to your business and not to JioOnline.
Enter the domain you own and select an option to let us know how you want you your domain to be mapped to this JioOnline website.

string-array.name: on_boarding_description
string-array.item: Hey, this is your JioOnline dashboard. Visit our FAQ section for more information.

Your potential customers are looking for your catalog online. Showcase it to them, to increase your revenues.
Manage your business on-the-go and get discovered online, real-time. Your digital success in your hands now.
Now your account experience is complete. Now, let us help you get 20 unique visitors to your new website. Why don\'t you broadcast your website on WhatsApp or share it with your existing customers?

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_enabled
string.comment: Error message shown in Home fragment when JioOnline keyboard is not enabled in the system

resources.string: JioOnline keyboard is not enabled in the system and thus won\'t be available as an input method in the input picker. Click here to resolve this issue.

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_selected
string.comment: Warning message shown in Home fragment when JioOnline keyboard is not selected as the default keyboard

resources.string: JioOnline keyboard is not selected as the default input method. Click here to resolve this issue.

string.name: settings__home__contribute
string.comment: Contributing message shown in Home fragment

resources.string: Thanks for trying out JioOnline keyboard! This project is still in alpha and therefore missing features. If you find any bugs or want to make a suggestion, please check out the repo on GitHub and file an issue. This helps making JioOnline keyboard better. Thank you!

string.name: pref__theme__source_assets
string.comment: Label for the theme source field

string.name: about__app_icon_content_description
string.comment: Content description of app icon in About

string.name: setup__welcome__title
string.comment: Title of Welcome fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__welcome__intro
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: Thanks for trying out JioOnline keyboard! Before you can start using it, we have to do the usual stuff and enable it in the system settings, set up your preferred language/layout, etc… But no worries - the setup wizard will guide you through this!

string.name: setup__welcome__privacy
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: JioOnline keyboard does fully respect your privacy and does not collect any user data. For more info see here:

string.name: setup__welcome__trust
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: The source code for JioOnline keyboard is publicly accessible for anyone, so you can easily review what JioOnline keyboard does in the background. Check out the repository link below.

string.name: setup__welcome__contribute
string.comment: Paragraph in Welcome fragment in Setup

resources.string: One last thing before you start the setup - if you encounter any bugs/crashes/issues with JioOnline keyboard or you have a feature request - head over to the GitHub repository linked below and file an issue. This helps in improving the experience for all users!

string.name: setup__enable_ime__title
string.comment: Title of Enable IME fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__enable_ime__text_before_enabled
string.comment: Description of state in Enable IME fragment before user enabled

resources.string: Android requires that every custom keyboard has to be manually enabled before you can use it. Click the button below to go to the Language & Input settings, then make sure to check \'JioOnline keyboard\'.

string.name: setup__enable_ime__text_after_enabled
string.comment: Description of state in Enable IME fragment after user enabled

resources.string: JioOnline keyboard has been successfully enabled. To continue click NEXT!

string.name: setup__make_default__title
string.comment: Title of Make IME default fragment in Setup

string.name: setup__make_default__text_before_switch
string.comment: Description of state in Make IME default fragment before user switched

resources.string: JioOnline keyboard is now enabled in your system. To actively use it, switch to JioOnline keyboard by selecting it in the input selector dialog!

string.name: setup__make_default__text_after_switch
string.comment: Description of state in Make IME default fragment after user switched

resources.string: Successfully switched the default keyboard to JioOnline keyboard!

string.comment: Title of crash dialog

string.name: crash_dialog__description
string.comment: Description of crash dialog

resources.string: Sorry for the inconvenience, but JioOnline has crashed due to an unexpected error.\n\nIf you wish to report this error, click on "Copy to clipboard", then on the "Open bug report" button. Fill out the bug report and paste the log. This helps in making JioOnline better and more stable for everyone. Thank you!

string.name: crash_notification_channel__title
string.comment: Title of crash notification channel

string.name: crash_once_notification__title
string.comment: Title of the notification for a single crash

string.name: crash_multiple_notification__title
string.comment: Title of the notification for consecutive crashes
